author: coheigea
msg: [WSS-259] - Some changes to element location for signature/encryption
- Added a new element location method which tries the SOAP body first, before searching for the wsu:Id/Id. WSSecEncrypt and the EnvelopeIdResolver now use this.
- Avoided searching for an element in the non InclusivePrefix case in WSSecSignature
- Made EnvelopeIdResolver non-static for security reasons
